name: Scrap Hero
description:
This is my first game using the Unity Engine and my first ever game jam submission (Ludum Dare 52). The game is set in a junkyard where the player must harvest scrap to craft weapons. 

Controls

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Attack: Left click

Tools

  • Development: Unity Engine
  • Art: Gimp
  • SFX & Music: sfxer, Ableton Live 9

Any feedback is greatly appreciated!
